actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations of $685,000,000 for fiscal year 1974 for military assistance under the Foreign Assistance Act. Authorizes $732,000,000 in appropriations for fiscal year 1974 under such Act, for security supporting assistance. Authorizes additional appropriations for fiscal year 1974 under the Foreign Military Sales Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961, and for other purposes.
